about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a young girl with big dreams in My Summer Job: Dialing for Dreams! This exciting puzzle game takes you on a journey of determination and hard work as you help Molly make her way through the world of telemarketing. With your guidance, Molly will learn the ins and outs of selling magazines and make her way to her ultimate goal, saving up enough money to make a big purchase.

In this unique deduction game, you will have the opportunity to test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge, and time management. Each call will be different, and it's up to you to figure out the right product to match each customer's desire. It's a challenging and rewarding experience that will put your skills to the test.

highlighted.name: On My Way To The Blacklist

In this unique deduction game, you will have the opportunity to test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge, and time management. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4700U
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 720
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: My Summer Job: Dialing for Dreams! is a puzzle game where you guide a young girl Molly through the world of telemarketing. Test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge and time management to match the right product to each customer's desire and save enough money to make dreams come true!
